edu.uw.zookeeper.protocol.server

Class ZxidEpochIncrementer

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.uw.zookeeper.protocol.server.ZxidIncrementer
      • edu.uw.zookeeper.protocol.server.ZxidEpochIncrementer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ZxidGenerator, ZxidReference

    public class ZxidEpochIncrementer
extends ZxidIncrementer
    zxid composed of a 32 bit epoch (MSB) and a 32 bit counter (LSB). Threadsafe
